lines.text: Oh, Otto, me boy, you're so damn inconsiderate. Now I'll have to dig a grave and bury your bloody ass.

I remember the first time I found out what was in prairie stew, I turned as green as spinach myself. But then, you know, it starts to grow on you a little bit. Rattlesnake and prairie dog... some damn good eatin'!
It's them Pawnee you got to watch out for. They'll kill ya just as soon as look at ya. They'll scalp ya with the right hand and snatch your balls off with the left.
Becky, we ain't goin' back. I'd rather die than do that wouldn't you?
I don't want to die. I want to get there!
You better start using your head. Dumb people just don't make it out here.
